Topic.Title: Waitress Life Madness The Untold Story

Posts.EditableText:
Waitress Life Madness The Untold Story is a beautiful cooking simulation & an amazing love story game. Here in this love affair game the waitress is falling love with a handsome boyfriend and she wants to impress him, so let's help her by completing tons challenges in this cooking game. Get her ready for the most romantic love date, use your observation a skill and find her hidden stuff in her bedroom, make the yummy hamburger, collect all the dirty plates in short time, choose the attractive hair style and much more. After completing all the activities, the waitress girl is ready for her love date with her boyfriend. Play and enjoy this Waitress love Story game and increase your cooking skills in a fun way.

Key Features:

- Enjoy the cute love story of crazy waitress
- Perform leg spa in this salon game
- Amazing collection of outfits, footwear, jewelry and accessories
- Tons of different mini games
- Unique Girls Makeover game

Enjoy Game @ bit.ly/WaitressLoveStory
